meanings.definition: A collection of short literary or philosophical extracts.
meanings.sent1: The teacher shared a few analects from famous authors during the class.
meanings.sent2: I enjoy reading the analects of different poets to gain inspiration.
meanings.sent3: The analects of wisdom in that old book always make me smile.
meanings.sent4: Her mind was like an endless library filled with analects of knowledge.
meanings.sent5: The analects of the wise philosopher echoed in my mind long after reading them.

meanings.definition: A compilation of selected passages or writings.
meanings.sent1: The library had a special section dedicated to historical analects.
meanings.sent2: She studied the analects of various cultures to understand their beliefs.
meanings.sent3: The analects of recipes in that cookbook are my favorite to try.
meanings.sent4: His speech was like a beautiful analects of poetry and prose.
meanings.sent5: The analects of the ancient manuscript revealed hidden truths about the past.

meanings.definition: A book containing a collection of sayings or writings attributed to a particular author.
meanings.sent1: The bookstore displayed the analects of famous writers in a special section.
meanings.sent2: I cherish the analects of my favorite author for their profound insights.
meanings.sent3: The analects of jokes in that comedy book always make me laugh.
meanings.sent4: Her diary was like a personal analects of memories and emotions.
meanings.sent5: The analects of the renowned poet continue to inspire generations with their beauty.
